Articles.Content: I don't know how to install and run Outer Planets Mod correctly. As if someone could send some guide on this topic!

You need to instal the dependencies: Community terrain texture pack (bundled with OPM) Module manager and kopernucus. You may need to downgrade to 1.8.1 because Kopernicus is version locked and can only work on the version that it was programmed to. Put all of that into your game data folder. To access that go to steam:steam apps:common:Kerbal space program. You should see the fame data folder there. And when you run the game the planets should show up. 

By the way the mod Minor Planets Pack is an amazing mod that adds dwarf planets and goes well with OPM. Highly recommend you check it out.

On 4.05.2020 at 18:22, Kostas23 said:

Musisz zainstalować zależności: Pakiet tekstury terenu społeczności (w pakiecie z OPM) Menedżer modułów i kopernucus. Może być konieczne obniżenie wersji do wersji 1.8.1, ponieważ Kopernicus ma wersję zablokowaną i może działać tylko w wersji, dla której został zaprogramowany. Umieść to wszystko w folderze danych gry. Aby uzyskać dostęp do tego przejdź do Steam: aplikacje Steam: często: program kosmiczny Kerbal. Powinieneś zobaczyć tam folder danych sławy. A kiedy uruchomisz grę, planety powinny się pojawić. 

Nawiasem mówiąc, mod Minor Planets Pack to niesamowity mod, który dodaje planety karłowate i dobrze współpracuje z OPM. Gorąco polecam to sprawdzić.

I have 1.7.1 version ksp

I tried as you wrote and there are no planets, but there are entries in KSPedia and the larger boundaries of the Kerbol system (Sun)

Edited May 5, 2020 by Vanamonde

9 hours ago, Faraon2134 said: 


 

I tried as you wrote and there are no planets, but there are entries in KSPedia and the larger boundaries of the Kerbol system (Sun)

Did you install al of the mods for the version 1.7.3? Because Kopernicus seems to be the problem if it is installed in a version older or newer than the intended version it wont work.

 https://github.com/Kopernicus/Kopernicus/releases/ - Kopernicus (install the 1.7.3 version)
I have something wrong with kerbal space program because it doesn't work for me!

Question 1- why are you on KSP version 1.7.1? There are two newer 1.7.x versions (1.7.2 and 1.7.3) plus 1.8(.1) and 1.9(.1) after that.

Question 2- did you download the right versions of everything? A pretty significant change was made to the game's underlying Unity engine in version 1.8 so you MUST use a version of OPM, CTTP and Kopernicus that are for KSP 1.7.3, or possibly other 1.7.x versions. Kopernicus will complain loudly if you use the wrong version with a big error message and a screen full of nyan cats (no, I didn't know what those were either the first time I saw them), so I suspect you got the right version of that; make sure your CTTP and OPM versions are also the right ones for KSP 1.7.x.

To be totally honest, I think you should upgrade your KSP to 1.8.1 if you can; while it will break some older mods or those which aren't actively maintained, the features and improvements that come with it are worth the tradeoff and you should be able to just download and use the most recent versions of Kopernicus, OPM and CTTP without any further problems.

On 5/6/2020 at 3:35 PM, Faraon2134 said: 

I

Shouting doesn't  help.

What would help would be a log file along with a concise description of what isn't  working.

Seriously, we told you the problem,  how to solve it. If you don't read, then proceeds shouting, that won't help yourself.

Tl;dr. Use 1.7.3 or 1.8.1. OPM won't work  on 1.7.1.

Edited May 11, 2020 by ssd21345
